channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- SEO Smart Links
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- SEO Smart Links

item.title: CVE-2022-3135|2024-08-03T01:00:10.561Z -- unknown -- seo%20smart%20links
item.description: The SEO Smart Links WordPress plugin through 3.0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
